mapper.select: SELECT n_no, to_char(n_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as n_regdate, n_content, n_title, n_registrant FROM notice_tbl ORDER BY n_no desc
SELECT n_no, to_char(n_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as n_regdate, n_content, n_title, n_registrant FROM notice_tbl WHERE n_no = #{n_no}
SELECT count(n_no) FROM notice_tbl WHERE n_no > 0

SELECT n_no, to_char(n_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as n_regdate, n_content, n_title, n_registrant FROM (select n_no, n_regdate, n_content, n_title, n_registrant rownum as rnum from notice_tbl) WHERE rnum between #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page} ORDER BY n_no DESC, n_regdate DESC
